column2: A simple app to showcase Androids Material Design and some of the cool new cool stuff in Android Lollipop. RecyclerView, CardView, ActionBarDrawerToggle, DrawerLayout, Animations, Android Compat Design, Toolbar

column5:
Update README.md

* update copyright year to 2016
* update to latest android gradle build 1.3.0

* update build tools to 23.0.1
* update compile sdk to 23
* update target sdk to 23
* update support libs to v23.1.0
* update library dependency (those also update to support libs 23.1.0)
* update to newest ItemAnimator
* update to changes of MaterialDrawer

* update to use the new support design library
* update MaterialDrawer
* update AboutLibraries
* update Android-Iconics
* some more cleanup
* some new comments
* some reformatting

* refractor the LollipopShocase
* update BuildTools
* update appcompat and support libraries
* Switch to MaterialDrawer to simplify the DrawerLayout usage and to feature a Drawer which follows the Material Design Guidlines

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:mikepenz/Android-LollipopShowcase

# By Ivan Morgillo (2) and Mike Penz (1)
# Via Ivan Morgillo (1) and Mike Penz (1)
* 'master' of github.com:mikepenz/Android-LollipopShowcase:
  Add Gradle wrapper
  Add project files to .gitignore
  Update README.md
* fix large progressbar on app startup

* add gradle wrapper
* improve .gitignore
* fix intellij import

Add Gradle wrapper

This solve Intellij import issue

Update README.md

* format readme
* update copyright
* show progress if list is loading (on startup)

* fix ripple drawable on v21
* create extra layout because it will create visual issues on pre lollipop devices
* set dialog theme from appCompat so the dialog uses the accent color

* update libraries
* update AboutLibraries library and use new builder
* update package name for android-iconics
* fix FC if the screen is turned during the progress sample
* fix actiity below actionbar in detail view
* move drawer below the statusbar to follow the android guidelines
